mapper.insert: insert into user (userid, realname, password, phone, myimg, idcaid, username, profession, address, spass, logintime) values (#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{myimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logintime,jdbcType=DATE})

mapper.update:
update user
realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
myimg = #{myimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcaid = #{idcaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spass = #{spass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logintime = #{logintime,jdbcType=DATE},
where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
